name: Module
label: module
definition: classifier used to indicate a category used to modularize something based on principles of the model driven architecture methodology (MDA), including but not limited to separation of concerns, coherence, and establishing clear logical boundaries in order to increase reusability and maintainability
explanatoryNote: A module should be designed to reflect these principles, including a small number of models that have well-defined relationships with one another, that form a coherent and cohesive whole for some purpose, and that have clear boundaries or interfaces to other modules.

name: MaturityLevel
explanatoryNote: FIBO currently has three maturity levels: Informative, Provisional, and Release.
label: maturity level
definition: classifier used to indicate the state of an artifact with respect to its development lifecycle

name: Release
explanatoryNote: Release notes will be provided for any changes with respect to released content, and any revisions will be backwards compatible with the prior version to the degree possible.
label: release
definition: entity that is considered to be stable and mature from a development perspective

name: termOrigin
label: term origin
definition: document or other source from which a given term was taken directly; the range for this annotation can be a string, URI, or BibliographicCitation

name: Provisional
definition: entity that is considered to be under development
label: provisional
explanatoryNote: Provisional content is subject to change, and may change substantially prior to release. FIBO users should be aware that it is not dependable, but could be used for reference and as the basis for further work.

name: Informative
definition: entity that is considered deprecated but included for informational purposes because it is referenced by some provisional concept
explanatoryNote: Informative content will be removed as soon as all dependencies have been eliminated, thus FIBO users should not depend on it going forward.
label: informative

name: commonDesignation
definition: frequently used designation for an entity
label: common designation

name: definitionOrigin
label: definition origin
definition: document or other source from which a given definition was taken directly; the range for this annotation can be a string, URI, or BibliographicCitation

name: preferredDesignation
definition: recommended designation for an entity in some context
label: preferred designation

name: hasMaturityLevel
label: has maturity level
definition: links something to its state with respect to a development lifecycle
